markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Squeeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=828) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 265 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You Squeeze 5 feet per round (10 feet on a critical success). If you’re legendary in Acrobatics, you Squeeze at full Speed.

<title level="2">Quick Squeeze leads to...</title>
[Implausible Infiltration](/Feats.aspx?ID=596)
name: Quick Squeeze

<summary>

</summary>
